Camco Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser with Backflow Preventer, RV Accessories for Toilet Waste Tank Cleaning and Sensor Maintenance

Tired of stubborn toilet waste buildup in your RV? Introducing the Camco Rhino Blaster RV Tank Rinser with Backflow Preventer - your ultimate solution for a clean and hygienic RV experience.

This powerful rinser uses high-pressure water jets to blast away grime, sediment, and even stubborn soap scum. The included backflow preventer ensures safe and effective cleaning without contaminating your fresh water system.

  • High-Pressure Cleaning: The Rhino Blaster utilizes high-pressure water jets to thoroughly clean your RV's toilet waste tank.
  • Backflow Preventer: Protects your fresh water system from contamination during the rinsing process.
  • Easy to Use: Simply connect the rinser to your RV's freshwater connection and turn on the water for effortless cleaning.

The Camco Rhino Blaster is a must-have accessory for any serious RVer. Keep your RV fresh, clean, and ready for adventure with this powerful and reliable tank rinser.

View on AliExpress

The Camco Rhino Blaster is your ultimate solution for effortless and effective RV waste tank cleaning. This powerful rinser combines high-pressure water with a backflow preventer to ensure thorough sanitation while protecting your RV's plumbing system.

  • High-Pressure Water Jet: Delivers a forceful stream of water to effectively flush away waste and debris from your RV's toilet waste tank.
  • Backflow Preventer:
    • Prevents contaminated water from flowing back into your freshwater system, safeguarding your RV's plumbing.
  • Sensor Maintenance Feature:
    • Assists in keeping your RV's sensor clean and accurate for optimal waste level detection.

The Rhino Blaster is constructed with durable materials to withstand the rigors of RV use. It features a compact design that makes it easy to store and transport.

  • Thorough Cleaning: Eliminates waste build-up and odors, promoting a cleaner and healthier RV environment.
  • Safety & Protection:
    • The backflow preventer ensures the safety of your freshwater system by preventing contamination.
  • Improved Sensor Accuracy:
    • Helps maintain accurate sensor readings for effective waste management.

Simply connect the Rhino Blaster to your RV's water hose and aim the nozzle into the toilet waste tank. Activate the water flow to initiate the cleaning process. The high-pressure jet effectively dislodges waste and debris, leaving your tank sanitized and ready for use.
